title: Ping not coming down
body:
Good Afternoon,

   Im from Belize Central America and i am on the NA server. The ping is usually at 60 but for like a week or two now its been stuck at 147. Nothing i do lets it drop. 


Please helppp!!!

replies.body: Hey there, you're pretty far from the NA server so your ping may be generally higher.  Your routing may have changed as well causing a higher ping, but a traceroute can tell us more.  Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a route to the game server: 104.160.131.1.  Run it for about 5 minutes, replace the IP address with dashes on the first two rows only, and let me know what you find.

Happy to help, and thanks for the info here!  Review these logs, it looks like your connection is crapping out before ever leaving your network.  Your router is trying to signal out to the big open world but it's already rocketed to instability.  For this specific case, I highly recommend going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your local network.  Once complete, another route should hopefully show signs of a healthier connection!
Hey i ran the Netalyzr test and it has several things wrong with it..... how can i get the info to you?
